title: Macro (Mac)
body:
(Okay, don't hate me for this)
 Ive seen a few people do it where the g's pop up making two bigger g's hence making GG and I want to do this, however I'm on a Mac. How can I do this using Automator?

Thx. (FYI, I only plan on using this for end of game, not for spamming, and I don't plan on doing another macros instead of doing this gg one.)
